data.name: Shangrila for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Shangrila is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born October 14th in Sydney, Australia, Shangrila is a highly intelligent individual who has two Bachelor’s degrees in Art and Anthropology as well as a Master’s degree in Archeology.

Shangrila love learning. She has a day job now and combines it with her night work. Shangrila has designed and built a few houses, and that is what she will continue to do. She is super creative and she love to physically make things. She grew up around power tools and building homes.

The reason why Shangrila decided to try herself as a prostitute is that from her main work by the end of the week she had ten dollars left. She had a lot of student loans and ten dollars left of her pay check and four hours of traffic every day when she was going to work, she was miserable. Then it was as if the skies had opened and there was this light. So she started working on the street at night and in the first day she made 600 bucks!

So, now Shangrila has 2 different lives.

Help Shangrila to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Shangrila is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
